didn't say so and s=

regarding he did=

mention this tw=

with it. =
So please don't try accuse me of something stupid I'm a grown ass women

d belive me if I say something accusing you. YOU WILL KNOW IT...You mean 
n=
othing to me and I can say how I feel...last time I checked my father name =
was 
Cecil Rosa.

It does look to me li=
ke others are misunderstanding what Rasterer is saying. 
This is a big prob=
lem with e-mail. I've never seen him state that the boxes 
don't work.

I t=
hink it's rather admirable if someone has=C2=A0seen no evidence of themselv=
es over 
a considerable amount of time, yet keeps looking. Is that the case=
 here? 


After a while, most people start to get discouraged. I have been =
in places where 
others recorded EVP sessions and got some EVP, and my reco=
rder a mere inches 
away didn't get anything.=C2=A0Then there are times whe=
n I get dozens of them and 
others get nothing. As I just noted in a previo=
us post, there's an awful lot we 
don't know here. My suspicion based on th=
e above is that whatever is producing 
the=C2=A0EVP can be highly selective=
.=C2=A0But I don't know that for sure.

Zack

<DIV>It does look to me like others are misunderstan=
ding what Rasterer is saying. This is a big problem with e-mail. I've never=
 seen him state that the boxes don't work.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I t=
hink it's rather admirable if someone has seen no evidence of themselv=
es over a considerable amount of time, yet keeps looking. Is that the case =
here? </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>After a while, most people start to get=
 discouraged. I have been in places where others recorded EVP sessions and =
got some EVP, and my recorder a mere inches away didn't get anything. =
Then there are times when I get dozens of them and others get nothing. As I=
 just noted in a previous post, there's an awful lot we don't know here. My=
 suspicion based on the above is that whatever is producing the EVP ca=
n be highly selective. But I don't know that for sure.</DIV>
<DIV>&nbs=
p;</DIV>
<DIV>Zack<BR><BR></DIV>

pacing=3D0 cellPadding=3D0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD vAlign=3Dtop>You asked several=
 questions, so I'll take them one at a time:<BR><BR>1) you hope what? that =
i made a fool out of myself or that i called it in or perhaps both?  <=
BR><BR>I hope you called it in. Your resistance to giving the police inform=
ation you said you thought you had on a child abductor, even after several =
prompts, makes me hope you did call it in, and didn't just say that to stop=
 me from prompting you. I don't know of course, I am not there. I have no d=
esire that you make a fool of yourself, but if it helps save a child from a=
m abductor, I think it would be worth it.<BR><BR>2) Why don't you get on th=
e box, and do some asking? <BR><BR>As I have said in the past, my experienc=
e with those boxes has shown me nothing paranormal yet.  However, peop=
le continue to say there is more to it than my experience.  And so, I =
am keeping an open mind and trying to examine the evidence you provide.<BR>=
<BR>3) Why are negative people on
 these lists anyway. if you guys don't be=
lieve in this type of technology, why the heck are you all here? <BR><BR>If=
 I had absolulely no belief that there might be something interesting going=
 on with the technology, I would not have been so insistent that you give y=
our information to the police.  How could a person, of good conscience=
, not prompt you to give that information to the police?  Again how is=
 that a negative thing to do?<BR><BR>Wouldn't the really negative thing be =
to ignore it?<BR><BR><BR><BR><BR><BR>--- On <B>Tue, 7/27/10, SnowfireL@aol.=
 com <I><SnowfireL@aol. com></I></B> wrote:<BR>

<TD vAlign=3Dtop>When you label the files with what you heard,=

ear without your hints, you need to send them out unlabeled.<BR><BR><BR>---=
